attributes.action: The FA to provide a shortlist of 4 or 5 candidates for public online selection.
attributes.additional_details: By letting 'the people' decide the next manager, the new person in charge would enjoy the benefit of having the people behind him from the start - this can only benefit our national team, and increase our chances to succeed in future tournaments.
attributes.background: Recent choices by the Football Association of the England football team manager have been less than ideal & one of their three man panel openly admits 'he is not a football expert', this enhances my fear that the next choice, if left to the FA will again be less than ideal. Our fans deserve better!
